title: Sekai Meisaku Douwa: Hakuchou no Mizuumi (Swan Lake)
synopsis: When Prince Siegfried spots a beautiful swan with a crown on its head, for some reason he feels compelled to follow it. He discovers that the swan is, in fact, a princess named Odette, who is under a wizard's curse that causes her to become a swan by day. The wizard, Rothbart, wants to keep Odette to himself, and the only thing that can break the spell on Odette is a man who truly loves her, with all his heart and soul...
voices: ['Takeshita, Keiko', 'Shigaki, Taro', 'Mugihito', 'Matsukane, Yoneko', 'Ichiryuusai, Harumi', 'Shiraishi, Fuyumi', 'Koike, Asao']
staff: [['Yabuki, Kimio', ['Director']], ['Wakamatsu, Masashi', ['Theme Song Composition', ' Theme Song Arrangement']], ['Tchaikovsky, Pyotr Ilyich', ['Original Creator', ' Music']], ['Ebisawa, Kazuo', ['Background Art']]]
